name: Merge Design: home makeover
description:
A lovely blend of heart warming stories and beautiful home design puzzles. Restore old memories and renovate homes to give them new life. Merge tools and shabby furniture to get new items and renovate old rooms and mansions from scratch!

Welcome to your design adventure where you will solve relaxing and addictive merge puzzles. Help the adorable characters to restore their homes back to the lovely place from their memories. Will it be possible to makeover the old family houses into masterpieces of interior design or did their stories come to an end?..

Merge Design features:

Enjoy merge gameplay - items will not just disappear when you match them, they will upgrade and evolve into useful tools and items that you can use to repair and decorate your house!

Easy and relaxing - transform old items and houses into something beautiful with a simple swipe!

Get inspiration - find out the beautiful interior design ideas and see your dream home decoration come true.

Dive into the adventure story - these old walls have so much to tell!
